item.title: Trump announces new role for his administration: 'White House AI and crypto czar'
item.description: Donald Trump names David Sacks White House AI and crypto czar.

item.title: CEO shooting latest: Flirtatious exchange could lead to identifying suspected gunman
item.description: Police appear to be closing in on an identity of the man suspected of gunning down UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson in Midtown Manhattan.

item.title: Search for gunman in CEO killing: What we know about the suspect
item.description: Video captured the moment the gunman walked up behind the CEO outside the Hilton in Midtown Manhattan, pointed his gun at him and fired.
